data:item.name: FRDM-STBI-NMH1000
data:item.display_title: Sensor shield board for NMH1000 Ultra-Low Power and Low-Voltage Magnetic Switch Sensor
data:item.overview:
Sensor Boards:
  • Sensor shield board: FRDM-STBI-NMH1000 is a sensor add-on/companion shield board for NMH1000 Ultra-Low Power and Low-Voltage Magnetic Switch Sensor
Embedded Software Framework:
  • IoT Sensing SDK: Provides Embedded sensor projects for the demo and custom kit (FRDMKE15-NMH1000) through MCUXpresso.
Evaluation and Visualization Software:
  • FreeMASTER Sensor Tool: Provides out-of-box sensor demo and application development platform for NMH1000
